products.name: Toilet Cleaner Concentrate
products.description: High-concentration eco-friendly toilet cleaner that's tough on stains but gentle on the planet
products.usage: Dilute 50ml concentrate with 450ml water. Apply to toilet bowl, let sit for 5 minutes, scrub and flush.

products.name: Bathroom Cleaner Concentrate
products.description: Multi-surface bathroom cleaner that cuts through soap scum and hard water stains
products.usage: Mix 30ml concentrate with 470ml water in a spray bottle. Spray on surfaces, wipe clean.

products.name: Dish Wash Gel Concentrate
products.description: Powerful grease-cutting formula that's gentle on hands and the environment
products.usage: Use 1-2 drops per dish. For heavily soiled items, use more as needed.

products.name: Glass Cleaner Concentrate
products.description: Streak-free shine for all glass and mirror surfaces
products.usage: Dilute 20ml concentrate with 480ml water. Spray and wipe with microfiber cloth.

products.name: Floor Cleaner Concentrate
products.description: Versatile floor cleaner for all floor types - tiles, marble, wood, and more
products.usage: Add 40ml concentrate to 5 liters of water. Mop floors as usual.

products.name: Hand Wash Concentrate
products.description: Gentle hand wash that cleanses without drying your skin
products.usage: Dilute 100ml concentrate with 400ml water. Use as regular hand wash.

products.name: Detergent Liquid Concentrate
products.description: High-efficiency laundry detergent for spotless, fresh-smelling clothes
products.usage: Use 30ml for regular load, 50ml for heavily soiled clothes.

products.name: Fabric Softener Concentrate
products.description: Makes clothes soft, fluffy, and static-free
products.usage: Add 20ml to fabric softener dispenser for regular load.

products.name: Woolen Wash Liquid Concentrate
products.description: Specially formulated for delicate woolen and silk garments
products.usage: Hand wash: 10ml per liter. Machine wash: 30ml for delicate cycle.

products.name: Multipurpose Cleaner Concentrate
products.description: One solution for all your household cleaning needs
products.usage: Dilute 25ml with 475ml water for general cleaning. Use undiluted for tough stains.

products.name: Dry Coconut - Split
products.description: Premium quality dry coconut, split for easy use in cooking and snacking
products.usage: Use in curries, chutneys, desserts, or eat as a healthy snack.

products.name: Dry Coconut - Full
products.description: Whole dry coconuts with shell for maximum freshness
products.usage: Crack open and grate fresh coconut for cooking.

products.name: Residential Blend Tea
products.description: Aromatic tea blend perfect for everyday home brewing
products.usage: Boil 1 tsp tea with water and milk. Add sugar to taste.

products.name: Hotel Blend Tea
products.description: Strong, full-bodied tea blend for commercial use
products.usage: Ideal for making large batches. Use as per serving requirements.

products.name: Groundnut
products.description: Fresh, crunchy groundnuts - perfect for snacking and cooking
products.usage: Roast and season for snacking, or use in cooking.

products.name: Groundnut Seeds
products.description: Quality groundnut seeds for planting or culinary use
products.usage: Plant in well-drained soil or use in cooking.

products.name: Jaggery Powder
products.description: Natural sweetener made from pure sugarcane juice
products.usage: Use as sugar substitute in tea, desserts, and cooking.

products.name: Jaggery Cubes
products.description: Convenient jaggery cubes for portion-controlled sweetness
products.usage: Add to hot beverages or melt for cooking.

products.name: Fresh Tomatoes
products.description: Farm-fresh, juicy tomatoes picked at peak ripeness
products.usage: Use in salads, curries, sauces, and sandwiches.

products.name: Fresh Onions
products.description: Premium quality onions with strong flavor
products.usage: Use in all types of cooking - curries, salads, and more.

products.name: Green Chilli
products.description: Fresh, spicy green chillies to add heat to your dishes
products.usage: Add to curries, chutneys, or use as seasoning.

products.name: Fresh Brinjal
products.description: Tender eggplants perfect for various cuisines
products.usage: Grill, roast, curry, or stir-fry.

products.name: Fresh Drumstick
products.description: Nutritious drumsticks rich in vitamins and minerals
products.usage: Use in sambar, curries, and soups.

products.name: Lady Finger
products.description: Fresh okra with tender texture
products.usage: Stir-fry, curry, or add to stews.

products.name: Fresh Mangoes
products.description: Sweet, juicy mangoes - the king of fruits
products.usage: Eat fresh, make juice, or use in desserts.

products.name: Fresh Guava
products.description: Crunchy guavas with natural sweetness
products.usage: Eat fresh or make juice.

products.name: Jamun (Neredu)
products.description: Dark purple jamun berries with health benefits
products.usage: Eat fresh or make juice.

products.name: Fresh Papaya
products.description: Ripe papaya with natural enzymes for digestion
products.usage: Eat fresh, make smoothies, or use in salads.

products.name: Fresh Sapota
products.description: Sweet sapota with smooth texture
products.usage: Eat fresh when ripe.

products.name: Custard Apple
products.description: Creamy custard apple with unique flavor
products.usage: Scoop and eat fresh or make ice cream.

products.name: Fresh Pomegranate
products.description: Ruby red pomegranate seeds bursting with flavor
products.usage: Eat fresh seeds or make juice.

products.name: Fresh Bananas
products.description: Ripe bananas perfect for instant energy
products.usage: Eat fresh, add to smoothies, or use in baking.

products.name: Fresh Watermelon
products.description: Juicy watermelon perfect for hot days
products.usage: Eat fresh or make juice.

products.name: Sweet Melon
products.description: Sweet, fragrant melon with refreshing taste
products.usage: Eat fresh or add to fruit salads.
